Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) local ServerReturn = nil pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) return ServerReturn end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PetrifyScript = script:WaitForChild("PetrifyScript") StonesplosionScript = script:WaitForChild("StonesplosionScript")
Animations = { Swing = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, Thud = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Thud"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil} }
Sounds = { Rockfall = Handle:WaitForChild("Rockfall"), Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash") }
Grips = { Up = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.8, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0), Down = CFrame.new(0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0), Out = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1.8, 1, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 0, 0, -1) }
ToolEquipped = false
ReloadTime = 5
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then Activated() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down if Key == "x" and Down then local StonesplosionScriptClone = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(StonesplosionScript.Name) if StonesplosionScriptClone then return end local StonesplosionDisabled = Tool:FindFirstChild("StonesplosionDisabled") if StonesplosionDisabled then return end StonesplosionDisabled = Instance.new("BoolValue") StonesplosionDisabled.Name = "StonesplosionDisabled" Debris:AddItem(StonesplosionDisabled, 20) StonesplosionDisabled.Parent = Tool Tool.Grip = Grips.Down local Animation = Animations.Thud InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animation) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) local CurrentlyEquipped = true if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) wait(0.8) if CurrentlyEquipped then StonesplosionScriptClone = StonesplosionScript:Clone() local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = StonesplosionScriptClone local Center = Instance.new("Vector3Value") Center.Name = "Center" Center.Value = Handle.Position - Vector3.new(0, 2.75, 0) Center.Parent = StonesplosionScriptClone StonesplosionScriptClone.Disabled = false StonesplosionScriptClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Sounds.Rockfall:Play() Tool.Grip = Grips.Up end end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function DamageAndPetrify(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end local SwordStaffRecentlyHit = Hit:FindFirstChild("SwordStaffRecentlyHit") if SwordStaffRecentlyHit then return end SwordStaffRecentlyHit = Instance.new("StringValue") SwordStaffRecentlyHit.Name = "SwordStaffRecentlyHit" Debris:AddItem(SwordStaffRecentlyHit, 0.2) SwordStaffRecentlyHit.Parent = Hit local character = Hit.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and humanoid ~= Humanoid then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(5) if math.random() < 0.08 and not Tool.Enabled then local Petrifying = Instance.new("StringValue") Petrifying.Name = "Petrifying" if not character:FindFirstChild("Petrifying") then Debris:AddItem(Petrifying, 8) Petrifying.Parent = character local PetrifyScriptClone = PetrifyScript:Clone() local humanoidvalue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") humanoidvalue.Name = "Humanoid" humanoidvalue.Value = humanoid humanoidvalue.Parent = PetrifyScriptClone PetrifyScriptClone.Disabled = false PetrifyScriptClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end end end end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() then return end local CurrentlyEquipped = true if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) Tool.Enabled = false Tool.Grip = Grips.Out local Animation = Animations.Swing InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animation) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) wait(0.2) if CurrentlyEquipped then Sounds.Slash:Play() end wait(0.8) if CurrentlyEquipped then Tool.Grip = Grips.Up end wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.Animation then InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end end Tool.Grip = Grips.Up ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do InvokeClient("StopSound", v) v:Stop() end ToolEquipped = false end
Handle.Touched:connect(DamageAndPetrify)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator").Value Center = script:WaitForChild("Center").Value
Range = 200
Objects = {}
StonifyTag = Instance.new("BoolValue") StonifyTag.Name = "StoneStaffStonified"
PartColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") Color = PartColor.Color Material = Enum.Material.Slate VertexColor = Vector3.new(Color.r, Color.g, Color.b) Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=58972839"--"rbxasset://Textures/SlateTileMono.png"
Properties = { CharacterMesh = { BaseTextureId = Texture, OverlayTextureId = Texture, }, BasePart = { BrickColor = PartColor, Material = Material }, DataModelMesh = { VertexColor = VertexColor }, FileMesh = { TextureId = Texture, VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, }
function Stonify(Object) local StonifiedObjects = {} local function SetProperties(Object) local ObjectProperties = {} for i, v in pairs(Properties) do for ii, vv in pairs(v) do local PropertyExists = false pcall(function() local PropertyValue = Object[ii] PropertyExists = true end) if PropertyExists then if not Object:IsA("SpecialMesh") or Object.MeshType == Enum.MeshType.FileMesh then table.insert(ObjectProperties, {Property = ii, Value = Object[ii]}) Object[ii] = vv end end end end return ((ObjectProperties ~= {} and ObjectProperties) or nil) end local function StonifyObject(Object) local ObjectProperties = SetProperties(Object) if ObjectProperties then table.insert(StonifiedObjects, {Object = Object, Properties = ObjectProperties}) end if Object:IsA("BasePart") then for i, v in pairs(Object:GetChildren()) do StonifyObject(v) end end end StonifyObject(Object) return StonifiedObjects end
function GetTotalParts(MaxParts, PossibleParts, Parts) if MaxParts < PossibleParts then return MaxParts elseif Parts >= MaxParts then return 0 elseif MaxParts >= PossibleParts then local PartCount = (MaxParts - PossibleParts) if Parts <= MaxParts then PartCount = (MaxParts - Parts) if PartCount > PossibleParts then return PossibleParts else return PartCount end elseif PartCount >= PossibleParts then return PossibleParts else return PartCount end end end
function GetParts(Origin, Radius, MaxParts, Ignore) local Parts = {} local RerunFailed = false while #Parts < MaxParts and not RerunFailed do local Region = Region3.new((Origin - Vector3.new(Radius, Radius, Radius)), (Origin + Vector3.new(Radius, Radius, Radius))) local PossibleParts = GetTotalParts(MaxParts, 100, #Parts) local PartsNearby = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region, Ignore, PossibleParts) if #PartsNearby == 0 then RerunFailed = true else for i, v in pairs(PartsNearby) do table.insert(Parts, v) table.insert(Ignore, v) end end end return Parts end
Parts = {((Creator and Creator and Creator.Parent and Creator:IsA("Player") and Creator.Character) and Creator.Character)}
for i, v in pairs(Players:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Player") and v.Character then table.insert(Parts, v.Character) end end
for CurrentRange = 1, Range, 1 do local StonifiedObjects = {} for i, v in pairs(GetParts(Center, CurrentRange, 500, Parts)) do local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(v.Parent) if not player then table.insert(Parts, v) table.insert(StonifiedObjects, Stonify(v)) end end table.insert(Objects, StonifiedObjects) wait(1 / 30) end
local NewObjects = {} for i, v in pairs(Objects) do NewObjects[#Objects - (i - 1)] = v end Objects = NewObjects
for i, v in pairs(Objects) do for ii, vv in pairs(v) do for iii, vvv in pairs(vv) do if vvv.Object then for iiii, vvvv in pairs(vvv.Properties) do vvv.Object[vvvv.Property] = vvvv.Value end end end end wait(1 / 30) end
Debris:AddItem(script, 0)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
SetBackpack = script:FindFirstChild("SetBackpack")
PartColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") Color = PartColor.Color Material = Enum.Material.Slate VertexColor = Vector3.new(Color.r, Color.g, Color.b) TextureId = 58972839 Texture = ("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. TextureId)
Properties = { CharacterMesh = { BaseTextureId = TextureId, OverlayTextureId = TextureId, }, BasePart = { BrickColor = PartColor, Material = Material }, DataModelMesh = { VertexColor = VertexColor }, FileMesh = { TextureId = Texture, VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) }, Shirt = { ShirtTemplate = Texture }, Pants = { PantsTemplate = Texture } }
function SetBackpackEnabled(player, Enabled) if Player and SetBackpack then local PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then local SetBackpackClone = SetBackpack:Clone() SetBackpackClone.Disabled = false local Boolean = Instance.new("BoolValue") Boolean.Name = "Boolean" Boolean.Value = Enabled Boolean.Parent = SetBackpackClone Debris:AddItem(SetBackpackClone, 2) SetBackpackClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end end
function Stonify(Object) local ObjectsStonified = {} local function SetProperties(Object) local ObjectProperties = {} for i, v in pairs(Properties) do for ii, vv in pairs(v) do local PropertyExists = false pcall(function() local PropertyValue = Object[ii] PropertyExists = true end) if PropertyExists then if not Object:IsA("SpecialMesh") or Object.MeshType == Enum.MeshType.FileMesh then table.insert(ObjectProperties, {Property = ii, Value = Object[ii]}) Object[ii] = vv end end end end return ((ObjectProperties ~= {} and ObjectProperties) or nil) end local function StonifyObject(Object) local ObjectProperties = SetProperties(Object) if ObjectProperties then table.insert(ObjectsStonified, {Object = Object, Properties = ObjectProperties}) end end StonifyObject(Object) return ObjectsStonified end
function GetAllObjects(Parent, Classes) local Objects = {} local function CheckObjectForClass(Object, Classes) for i, v in pairs(Classes) do if Object:IsA(v) then return true end end return false end local function GetObjects(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if CheckObjectForClass(v, Classes) then table.insert(Objects, v) end GetObjects(v) end end GetObjects(Parent) return Objects end
Humanoid = script:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then
Humanoid = Humanoid.Value Character = Humanoid.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
StonifiedObjects = {} Limbs = {} FakeTools = {} EquippedTools = {}
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0
if Player then SetBackpackEnabled(Player, false) end
for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Anchored = true table.insert(Limbs, v) elseif v:IsA("Tool") then table.insert(EquippedTools, v) local Tool = Instance.new("Model") Tool.Name = v.Name for ii, vv in pairs(v:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("BasePart") then local Part = vv:Clone() Part.Anchored = true Part.CFrame = vv.CFrame Part.Parent = Tool end end if #Tool:GetChildren() > 0 then table.insert(FakeTools, Tool) Debris:AddItem(Tool, 8) Tool.Parent = Character end end end
for i, v in pairs(GetAllObjects(Character, {"BasePart", "Clothing", "DataModelMesh", "CharacterMesh"})) do table.insert(StonifiedObjects, Stonify(v)) end
Humanoid:UnequipTools()
for i = 1, 5 do Humanoid:TakeDamage(6) wait(1) end
for i, v in pairs(Limbs) do if v and v.Parent and v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Anchored = false end end
for i, v in pairs(EquippedTools) do Humanoid:EquipTool(v) end
for i, v in pairs(StonifiedObjects) do for ii, vv in pairs(v) do if vv.Object and vv.Object.Parent then for iii, vvv in pairs(vv.Properties) do vv.Object[vvv.Property] = vvv.Value end end end end
for i, v in pairs(FakeTools) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 if Player then SetBackpackEnabled(Player, true) end end
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)

--Made by Luckymaxer
StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Boolean = script:FindFirstChild("Boolean") if Boolean then StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, Boolean.Value) end
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)
